entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegisteredWaitHandle.Portable.cs + UnregisterPortableCore #106930
  • CG2 test followups #106929
  • [API Proposal]: Support General Math value creation without sign propagation #106927
  • [API Proposal]: Having negative indices for indexing from the end and wrapping / circular indexing from a starting index #106919
  • Fast path for {U}Int128.operator % when the modulus is within UInt64 #106915
    10.0.0
  • Mono AOT Benchmarks crash with PlatformNotSupportedException in IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher.IndexOfAnyCore #106914
  • [API Proposal]: ComObject.CreateInstance for ComWrappers #106912

Closed

  • Optimistic allocation of objects on the stack #1661
  • System.Security.Principal.Windows 4.7.0 package too large #104785
  • Default interface method is not part of the inheritance #106916
  • Wrong crossgen2 binary in artifacts/tests #80110
  • osx-arm64 NativeAOT Debug build failing with encoding_found assert #105906
    9.0.0
  • XmlSerializerTests.Xml_DerivedIXmlSerializable is failing on linux-musl legs #106865
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007054F #102210
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix errors in WhyDgml and account for cycles #106928
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono] inflate function pointer types; hang indirect call wrappers on the <Module> #106926
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add lld in dependency script #106913
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Move exposed assembly object and dynamic method table out of `DomainAssembly` #106911
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Merged

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix STLUR for 0 imm #106760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: emit vzeroupper before calls to the bulk write barrier helper #106908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use OpenSSL 3's HKDF if it is available #106906
    area-System.Security
  • Ensure that Arm64 correctly handles multiplication of simd by a 64-bit scalar #106839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable CommittedUsage event for segments #106831
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106897
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
